document: Machine learning is a field of AI focused on learning patterns from data.
Supervised learning uses labeled data to learn mappings from inputs to outputs.
Unsupervised learning discovers hidden structure without labels (e.g., clustering).
Reinforcement learning optimizes actions through trial and reward signals.
Cooking recipes are unrelated to machine learning models.
Deep learning stacks layers of neural networks to learn hierarchical features.
Backpropagation computes gradients to update weights via chain rule.
Activation functions like ReLU introduce non-linearity.
Batch normalization stabilizes training by normalizing activations.
Tea brewing instructions are irrelevant to deep learning.
Python is a high-level language valued for readability and rich ecosystems.
Python supports OOP, functional, and procedural paradigms.
The standard library provides batteries-included utilities for many tasks.
PEP 8 recommends consistent code style for Python programs.
Volcanic rocks composition is unrelated to Python.
Hugging Face Transformers provides pretrained models and tokenizers.
AutoModel and AutoTokenizer select classes based on checkpoints.
Trainer API simplifies training loops with callbacks and logging.
Datasets can be loaded and processed via the datasets library.
Shoe sizes in EU/US are unrelated to Transformers library.
Learning to rank optimizes ordering of documents for a query.
Pairwise methods compare positive and negative document pairs.
Listwise methods optimize metrics like NDCG directly.
BM25 is a strong term-matching baseline.
Weather forecasts are irrelevant to ranking methods.
Cosine similarity measures angle between normalized vectors.
Dot product scales with vector magnitudes as well as alignment.
Euclidean distance measures absolute differences in space.
Cosine distance is 1 - cosine similarity.
Dessert recipes are not relevant to vector similarity.
WordPiece splits words into subword units for open-vocabulary modeling.
Byte-Pair Encoding merges frequent byte pairs iteratively.
SentencePiece trains subword models on raw text.
Whitespace tokenization is brittle for many languages.
Sports scores are unrelated to tokenization.
BERT uses bidirectional self-attention across transformer encoder layers.
[CLS] token embedding often represents sequence-level information.
Pretraining tasks include MLM and NSP (in original BERT).
Fine-tuning adapts the pretrained backbone to downstream tasks.
Furniture assembly steps are unrelated to BERT.
NDCG@k rewards placing highly relevant documents near the top.
MAP aggregates average precision across queries.
Recall measures the fraction of relevant documents retrieved.
Precision measures the fraction of retrieved documents that are relevant.
Knitting tips are irrelevant to IR metrics.
Dropout randomly zeros units to reduce overfitting.
Weight decay penalizes large weights via L2 regularization.
Early stopping halts training when validation loss stops improving.
Data augmentation improves generalization by increasing data diversity.
Travel itineraries are not relevant to regularization.
